ccre.holders

Class StringHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.holders.StringHolder

  • public class StringHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    A holder for a String value. Has methods to modify the state, and subscribe to changes.
    Author:
    skeggsc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringHolder(java.lang.String value)
      Create a new StringHolder as if the value is not a default/nonexistence value.
      StringHolder(java.lang.String value, boolean mod)
      Create a new StringHolder.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String get()
      Get the current value of the StringHolder.
      EventInput getModifiedEvent()
      Get the event that is fired when the value changes.
      java.io.OutputStream getOutput()
      Get an output stream that writes to this StringHolder.
      boolean hasModified()
      Get whether or not the value has been modified.
      void notifyChanged()
      Notify listeners that the value has changed.
      void set(java.lang.String value)
      Modify the value, including setting this as modified and firing registered events if the value is different.
      void whenModified(EventOutput event)
      When the value changes, fire the specified event.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringHolder

        public StringHolder(java.lang.String value)
        Create a new StringHolder as if the value is not a default/nonexistence value.
        Parameters:
        value - the string value.

      • StringHolder

        public StringHolder(java.lang.String value,
            boolean mod)
        Create a new StringHolder. If mod is false, the value is interpreted as a default/nonexistence value.
        Parameters:
        value - the string value.
        mod - whether or not the value should be flagged as modified.

    • Method Detail

      • getModifiedEvent

        public EventInput getModifiedEvent()
        Get the event that is fired when the value changes.
        Returns:
        the event.

      • whenModified

        public void whenModified(EventOutput event)
        When the value changes, fire the specified event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to fire.

      • get

        public java.lang.String get()
        Get the current value of the StringHolder.
        Returns:
        the current value.

      • hasModified

        public boolean hasModified()
        Get whether or not the value has been modified. This is only false in some rare scenarios, because usually the default value counts as a modification.
        Returns:
        whether or not the value has been modified.

      • set

        public void set(java.lang.String value)
        Modify the value, including setting this as modified and firing registered events if the value is different.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value.

      • notifyChanged

        public void notifyChanged()
        Notify listeners that the value has changed.

      • getOutput

        public java.io.OutputStream getOutput()
        Get an output stream that writes to this StringHolder. Each line will be a new update to the value of the holder.
        Returns:
        the output stream that modifies the state of this.
